sentences.en: And have special Halloween and dance yak.
sentences.cn: 并有特殊的鬼节和舞牦牛.

sentences.en: Back at the hotel, we slipped on Chinese slippers and ate tiny, crispy bamboo skewers of sesame-coated yak and spiced steamed pumpkin and potato with Tibetan bread.
sentences.cn: 回到酒店，蹬着中式拖鞋，我们享受了丰盛的一餐：竹烤牦牛肉上还洒满了芝麻，辣味的蒸南瓜以及土豆配藏式面包。

sentences.en: Grassland area of 7700 hectares, mainly sheep farming mountains, white yak, cattle.
sentences.cn: 草原面积7700多亩, 主要养殖高山细毛羊 、 白牦牛 、 黄牛.

sentences.en: I have never eaten yak meat before.
sentences.cn: 我以前从未吃过牦牛肉.

sentences.en: It was concluded that there were arteriovenous anastomosis in yak's heart.
sentences.cn: 牦牛心室肌中存在着动静脉吻合.

sentences.en: It's just that when I think of you it makes me wanna yak eeeack.
sentences.cn: 这只是当我想起你让我想叫.

sentences.en: Products, yak meat, cattle show, Niuliu, steak, Niunan.
sentences.cn: 产品, 有牦牛肉, 牛展, 牛柳, 牛排, 牛腩.

sentences.en: The agriculture of Tibet is based on animal husbandry, with major livestock and fowl including sheep, goat, yak, yellow cat, dzo, horse, donkey, mule, Tibet chicken, and Tibet pig.
sentences.cn: 农业以畜牧业为主。 主要家畜、家禽主要有绵羊、山羊、牦牛、黄牛、犏牛、马、驴、骡、藏鸡、藏猪等。

sentences.en: The influence of capability of Yak hairs treated with different plasma was studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了各等离子体参数对牦牛毛纤维性能的影响.

sentences.en: The main materials for bone carving are yak bones and buffalo bones.
sentences.cn: 骨雕的原料主要是牦牛骨和水牛骨.

sentences.en: The most common materials Tibetan jewelry are Yak bone.
sentences.cn: 藏饰最常见的材料当属牦牛骨.

sentences.en: The nomads of the the earth with theirss creature and sleep in Yak - haired tents.
sentences.cn: 本地的牧民们带着她们的牲畜在此间游牧,晚上则睡在牦牛毛编制的帐篷中.

sentences.en: The processing technology of crystallized yak paunch was studied.
sentences.cn: 探讨了水晶牦牛肚的加工工艺.

sentences.en: We can sell the yak skins and the meat and hair.
sentences.cn: 我们把牦牛皮、牦牛肉和牦牛的毛卖出去.

sentences.en: We can sell yak skin, meat and wool.
sentences.cn: 我们可以卖牦牛的皮 、 肉和毛.

sentences.en: Yak body up and down all Po, we sold it to buy food and other things.
sentences.cn: 牦牛全身上下都是宝, 我们卖了它用来买粮食等其他东西.

sentences.en: Yak meat tastes like tough beef.
sentences.cn: 旄牛肉吃起来有点像硬牛肉.

trans.tran_en: an animal of central Asia that looks like a cow with long hair

trans.tran_cn: <非正，贬>没完没了地谈些无关要紧的事，喋喋不休，唠叨
